Package com.g1.mychess.auth.repository

Interface UserTokenRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<UserToken,String>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<UserToken,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<UserToken,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<UserToken,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<UserToken,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<UserToken>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<UserToken,String>
public interface UserTokenRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<UserToken,String>
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on UserToken entities. Provides methods to retrieve user tokens based on various criteria.

  • Method Details

    • findByUserIdAndUserTypeAndTokenType

      Optional<UserToken> findByUserIdAndUserTypeAndTokenType(Long userId, String userType, UserToken.TokenType tokenType)
      Finds a user token by user ID, user type, and token type.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID associated with the token
      userType - the type of the user (e.g., "ROLE_ADMIN", "ROLE_PLAYER")
      tokenType - the type of the token (e.g., EMAIL_VERIFICATION)
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found UserToken, or empty if no token matches

    • findByUserIdAndUserTypeAndTokenTypeAndUsed

      Optional<UserToken> findByUserIdAndUserTypeAndTokenTypeAndUsed(Long userId, String userType, UserToken.TokenType tokenType, boolean isUsed)
      Finds a user token by user ID, user type, token type, and the 'used' status.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID associated with the token
      userType - the type of the user (e.g., "ROLE_ADMIN", "ROLE_PLAYER")
      tokenType - the type of the token (e.g., EMAIL_VERIFICATION)
      isUsed - the used status of the token (true if the token has been used, false if not)
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found UserToken, or empty if no token matches

    • findByTokenAndTokenType

      Optional<UserToken> findByTokenAndTokenType(String token, UserToken.TokenType tokenType)
      Finds a user token by token value and token type.
      Parameters:
      token - the unique token string
      tokenType - the type of the token (e.g., EMAIL_VERIFICATION)
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found UserToken, or empty if no token matches

    • findByUserIdAndTokenTypeAndUsed

      Optional<UserToken> findByUserIdAndTokenTypeAndUsed(Long userId, UserToken.TokenType tokenType, boolean used)
      Finds a user token by user ID, token type, and the 'used' status.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID associated with the token
      tokenType - the type of the token (e.g., EMAIL_VERIFICATION)
      used - the used status of the token (true if the token has been used, false if not)
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found UserToken, or empty if no token matches
